alert.note: Alert for Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 12:39PM MDT until June 14 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... South Fork Clearwater River At Stites affecting Idaho County. For the Clearwater River...including At Stites...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Clearwater River At At Stites. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect possible flooding to state Highway 13 near the town of Harpster. River will vary between just above and below flood stage through Tuesday. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 300 PM MDT /200 PM PDT/.
